node.title: Here’s what we know about the students who were killed at Oxford High.
node.alt: A vigil at LakePoint Community Church in Oxford, Mich. At least two students who were injured in the shooting remain in critical condition.
node.description: One was a star football player. Another was on the school’s bowling team.
node.content: ["What began as an ordinary Tuesday at Oxford High School in Oakland County, Mich., was punctuated by the sound of gunfire as students settled in for fifth-period classes.", "A gunman had opened fire in a hallway. A 15-year-old student has since been charged with murder and terrorism in the attack, which killed four teenagers and wounded seven other people, including a 47-year-old teacher.", "At least two of the injured students, who officials said ranged in age from 14 to 17, remained in critical condition on Wednesday. The teacher, the only wounded adult, was discharged from a hospital on Tuesday.", "Here is what we know about those who were killed.", "Madisyn Baldwin, 17, was described by her grandmother on a GoFundMe page as a \u201cbeautiful, smart, sweet loving girl.\u201d", "She was also a \u201ctalented artist and big sister,\u201d Karen D. McDonald, the Oakland County prosecutor, said at a news conference on Wednesday afternoon.", "Ms. Baldwin\u2019s grandmother, Jennifer Mosqueda, said her family was \u201clost for words,\u201d and that the day of the shooting had been \u201cabsolutely unbelievable for all involved.\u201d", "\u201cThis horrific day could never have been imagined or planned for,\u201d she said.", "Tate Myre, 16, was a linebacker and tight end on the school\u2019s football team and had recently earned an all-region award from the Michigan High School Football Coaches Association. He died on Tuesday in a patrol car as the authorities rushed him to a hospital.", "He was described by his classmates as incredibly well liked, funny \u2014 \u201ca sarcastic, joking person\u201d \u2014 and intelligent.", "\u201cIt\u2019s just hard for me to see this person \u2014 I have him in my yearbook pictures,\u201d Joyeux Times, a junior, said. \u201cWe went to the same place, on the same day, expecting to go home with our families.\u201d", "An online petition to rename the school\u2019s stadium after Mr. Myre had more than 67,000 signatures on Wednesday.", "Justin Shilling, 17, was on the Oxford Wildcats boys\u2019 bowling team, according to the school\u2019s website. He had scored a match victory in March, helping lead the team to a 30-0 win.", "He died on Wednesday at about 10:45 a.m. at McLaren Oakland Hospital in Pontiac, Mich., according to the authorities.", "Hana St. Juliana, 14, was the youngest person killed. She was a freshman who played on the volleyball and basketball teams, officials said.", "At the news conference on Wednesday, Ms. McDonald, the prosecutor, said the girl\u2019s parents wanted people to know that their daughter was \u201cone of the happiest and most joyful kids.\u201d", "She had played volleyball since middle school and wore the No. 9 jersey on the Oxford team, The Detroit News reported."]
